report.title: Basic Verification Grid
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id AND oi.deleted=false JOIN surveys su ON s.survey_id = su.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN list_taxa_taxon_lists lttl ON lttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id AND l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id=o.verified_by_id WHERE (su.id=#survey# or #id#<>0) AND (o.record_status = '#record_status#' OR '#record_status#' = 'all' OR #id#<>0) AND (o.id=#id# OR #id# = 0) AND s.deleted=false #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, su.title, su.website_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, lttl.taxon, s.entered_sref, l.name as location_name, oi.path, CASE o.record_status WHEN 'C' THEN 'Data Entry Complete' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Progress' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Test' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sent for verification' ELSE '' END AS record_status, u.username as verified_by

param.name: id
param.description: Enter the ID of a record to view or leave blank for all records.

param.name: survey
param.description: Select the survey to return data for (not applicable when viewing a single record by ID).
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: record_status
param.description: Select the record status to view data for (not applicable when viewing a single record by ID).
